Vulois

Vulois was shocked at what he hear. Battera, working for the 
Alliance? And Cybershark too! This must have been what Convix said 
about a new mission. But he couldn't take it. He needed to go to 
Cybertron. He would try once more to reach Battera, and if their was 
no reaction, he would leave her to do what she wanted with her life.

"Battera, listent to yourself! They've done something to you! You are 
not an Alliance soldier! You are an emissairy of peace, an ex-
Predacon and my friend! Please remember Battera! You shouldn't be 
like this."

That's when he noticed the chip on her arm. He reached for it, but it 
shocked him with high voltage. It had frazzled some of his wires. He 
looked at her.

"What...what have they done to you?"

Vulois fell to the ground at her feet, in stasis lock because of the 
damage the pulse sent to his head.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron stared at the probe intensly.

"So how do we get it back to base?"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq counted the numbers.

"Alright! We out number The Trainers now. Come on, what are we 
waiting for! It's time for battle!"
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream arrived at the ruins of the Predacon cave, watching the 
Lavacons come after him.

"Alright Phobia, where are you?"

He still didn't completly trust Phobia. He did a little more than 
before, but he still couldn't rule out the possibility of a double-
agent. He had to be on his toes as this plan began.
______________________________________________________________________
Prebon

Prebon saw the look of worry on Spears' face.

"Don't worry. If he ever did anything to you, he would be a hunted 
bot for the rest of his life. Even if it would spawn millions of 
years, I would hunt hin down for what he did. Just stay close and 
nothing will happen."

He contined walking.

(Plese excuse this, but I have a question. I didn't watch G1 very 
much, and so if this is a really dumb question please don't laugh. 
But, the way I know it, The Ark crashed, and than a few million years 
later were awaken. But than wouldn't they have greatly out-dated 
technology? In the movie when they were with other bots from 
Cybertron they looked no different. I would expect at least some 
subtle changes. What's with that?)
